name: Parse message

Weather Station
func:
msg.payload = {
    name: msg.msg433.name,
    temp: msg.msg433.TEMP,
    wind: msg.msg433.WINSP,
    gust: msg.msg433.WINGS,
    direction: msg.msg433.WINDIR,
    rain: msg.msg433.RAIN,
    rainrate: msg.msg433.RAINRATE,
    humidity: msg.msg433.HUM,
    battery: msg.msg433.BAT
}
return msg;
